lead_paragraph: Coming off record earnings, American Airlines says it will make profit-sharing payments to employees.

headline.print_headline: Joining Other Airlines, American Will Share Profits
headline.main: Joining Other Airlines, American Will Share Profits

snippet: Coming off record earnings, American Airlines says it will make profit-sharing payments to employees.
abstract: American Airlines announces plan to share 5 percent of its pretax 2016 earnings with employees, addressing complaints that it had fallen behind other airlines in profit-sharing.
